You can also use view components with arguments. Those arguments are passed via a dictionary (Hash table), like this:
If you want to pass a body to the component, just use the normal colon + indnet to do so:
intro.pre: <% component MyViewComponentWithBody: %> html content that will be sent to the user if the component will call the RenderBody() method <% end %>
intro.p: The contents of a component is evaluated when you call RenderBody, so if you will call RenderBody multiple times, you will send the output of the component's body multiple times as well.
